name: Operation Riptide
Description: Dive into Operation Riptide! New challenges await with new maps new game mode options and the all-new Private Queues!

name: Condition Zero
Description: Condition Zero is a First Person Shooter video game that is developed by Ritual Entertainment Turtle Rock Studios and Valve and published by Sierra Entertainment and Valve

name: Modern Warfare
Description: The Variety DLC Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered includes four remastered multiplayer maps from the original game!

name: Broken Fang
Description: Join the fight and take part in Operation Broken Fang. New challenges await with the all-new Retakes and the exclusive Broken Fang Premier

name: Source
Description: Counter-Strike: Source blends Counter-Strike's award-winning teamplay action with the advanced technology of Source technology.

name: The Resistance
Description: Make a final strike to the enemy's evil ambitions in three new Multiplayer maps: Excavation Airship and Chancellery.

name: Frontline Fighters
Description: Ready the Peashooters and prepare for the craziest funniest shooter in the universe: Plants vs. Zombies Frontline Fighters
